name: DENTAL_PERIO_CMT_HX_RM
description: This table contains the historical information for dental periodontal comments.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical instant in the mouth finding record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_PERIO_CMT_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple periodontal comments associated with the finding and historical instant from the DENTAL_PERIO_CMT_HX table

columns.name: DENTAL_PCMNT_HISTOR
columns.description: Stores the revision history of the periodontal comment for a mouth record.
